name: Sailor (Poppy0511)
description:
Overview

It's time to become a Sailor in Despina. Start to explore the life of Despina's sailor! Try to talk with the residents, sailors, and camel traders, to feel the local customs of Despina and accept the challenge! Sailor is a unique occupation in Despina.  

Bobby is a beginner sailor of Despina, she wants to explore the ocean and get her own boat. and old sailor guide her and introduced her to a camel trader...

Control

ESC to open the function menu

Info

DATT 3300 LAB 02

Student name: Zihan Cao

Game design document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1bZJ-yoMnd9HXVmWn9bqIKaMTspo0owW_8rnKiy3pD1Y/edit?usp=sharing

Note

This is not a complete game, it is one of a  level of a whole game.
